title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
descriptions:
Introducing our luxurious set of 16 Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candles, perfect for your mother, wife, daughter, or friend! These delightful scented candles are made from natural soy wax and infused with essential oils, providing a clean, eco-friendly burn with a wide range of fragrances to suit any mood or occasion.

Choose from a variety of 16 enchanting scents, including Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Bergamot, Fig, Lavender, Lemon, Spring, Gardenia, Strawberry, Rosemary, Peppermint, Bluebell, Wood Sage & Sea Salt, Peony Cherry Blossom, and English Pear & Freesia. With a burn time of 18-20 hours per candle, these aromatic treasures will fill your space with warmth and relaxation for hours on end.

But that's not all! Our candles come in stylish and portable tin cans, making them the perfect gift for any occasion. Not only are they recyclable, but the empty tin cans can also be repurposed as flowerpots or unique home decorations.

Experience the soothing and rejuvenating benefits of aromatherapy with our luxurious set of 16 Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candles. Order now and elevate your gifting game to new heights!

(Note: Always keep candles out of reach of children and pets when unattended to avoid accidents and fire.)
